short_summary: SNOW AND ICE CONTROL SERVICES FOR PRIORITY PARKING
description: This is an invitation to bid for the snow and ice control services for priority parking operations. This will be an annual contract with a 3-year duration and the total area of service will be approximately 280,000 m2.
full_summary:
**Priority Parking Snow and Ice Control Operations RFP**
=============================================

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the Priority Parking Snow and Ice Control Operations RFP, solicitation number W6889-230155. The proposed contract will provide Snow and Ice Control (SNIC) operations for approximately 280,000 m2 of designated vehicle parking and sidewalks throughout Garrison (Grn) Petawawa and the Pembroke Armouries.

**Contract Details:**
------------------------

*   **Contract Period:** 3 years, from 2024 to 2027
*   **Contract Schedule:** The contract will be invoiced over six (6) months from November to April for each year of the contract
*   **Active SNIC Operations Season:** October 15 to April 15 each year

**Services Provided:**
----------------------

The work under this requirement will include the provision of all labour, supervision, materials, tools, equipment, and fuel to support winter parking lot maintenance by conducting SNIC operations for designated parking and sidewalks.

**Special Conditions:**
----------------------

*   **Security Clearance:** Personnel security screening is required prior to gaining access to classified information, assets, or sites associated with this requirement.
*   **Mandatory Bidders' Site Visit:** A site visit will be held at a later date, and interested parties must be aware of this requirement.

**Tender Requirements:**
-------------------------

*   **Proposal Submittal:** Proposals must be submitted by October 3, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
*   **Submission Requirements:** In order to be considered responsive, all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the deadline
*   **Late Submissions:** Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive

**Contracting Entity:**
---------------------

*   **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**
---------------------

Wayne Cook, (SPAC/PSPC)
wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This contract will be awarded to the lowest price bidder. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to award the contract in whole or in part. Further details can be obtained on the Ariba Discovery platform.
